meanings.sent1: The dentist's drill was the painfullest thing I have ever experienced.
meanings.sent2: Her scream was the painfullest sound I had ever heard.
meanings.sent3: The painfullest part of the movie was when the main character's dog ran away.
meanings.sent4: The painfullest memories are often the hardest to forget.
meanings.sent5: The painfullest truth is sometimes the most necessary to face.

meanings.definition: To the greatest degree of pain.
meanings.sent1: She painfullested her ankle while running in the park.
meanings.sent2: He painfullested his hand while trying to fix the broken shelf.
meanings.sent3: The cat painfullested its tail when it got caught in the door.
meanings.sent4: The hiker painfullested his knee when he slipped on the rocky trail.
meanings.sent5: The athlete painfullested his muscles after the intense workout.
